Question
========

Miriam hypothesized an interaction between two quantitative predictors ($X_{1}$ and $X_{2}$) in their effect on a quantitative outcome measure (*Y*).

How can she best include the interaction in her regression model? 
Answerlist
----------
* Cross product between centered $X_{1}$ and centered $X_{2}$ calculate and include.
* Cross product between uncentered $X_{1}$ and uncentered $X_{2}$ calculate and take.
* Cross product between centered $X_{1}$ and centered *Y* calculate and include.
* Cross product between uncentered $X_{1}$ and uncentered *Y* compute and record.

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------
* Correct
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
* Incorrect
